message.body: Sure. Any day but Friday works but can we keep it kind of local or close to public transit? I have a stress fracture in my foot so I'm hobbling along... Tho I'm sure I'll feel somewhat better next week.
Nothing specific. I have arthritis in my big toe joint and its painful so I walk/run with more weight on areas of my foot that aren't equipped.
Thus the stress fracture. The good thing is my toe doesn't bother me at all by comparison :)
Boo :-( We'll stay close by then. How about ########### on Monday night?
Hey, do you want to just combine Spy and dinner/drinks on Thursday?
I was thing the same! That sounds great!

Hope this works. Its a link to a Groupon for the Spy exhibit. should we grab this for next Thurs? http://touch.groupon.com/deals/the-franklin-institute-1?p=1&utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&sid=74277d21-ba49-4e40-a142-b01bbe170255&division=philadelphia&user=31fdc2dcdbed219799bc3dd718589a01bdfda2532ca752db0dfc48e0e63be102&date=20130605&s=body&c=deal_button&d=deal-page&utm_campaign=the-franklin-institute-1&mobile=true
Ooh, nice! Do you mind if my friend ##### joins us? He was interested too
Sure. I know ##### too. He's friends w/ ##### & #######.
Oh, duh ! Can't believe I forgot. I'll buy the tickets :-) Thanks!
